activities.empty: There is no card associated with your name yet. When you add task cards or videos to the feed, you‚Äôll see their summaries here.

mode.taskDescription: You can select one of the tasks you completed and share it as a card.

fields.cardDescriptionPlaceholder: Task description or free share text... (optional)

video.label: Video (optional)
video.hint: In the free version videos can be up to 30 seconds. The app currently supports videos up to 3 minutes.
video.tooLongBody: Currently only videos up to 3 minutes are supported. Please shorten your video and try again.
video.overFreeLimitBody: In the free version, the video you want to send must be shorter than 30 seconds. You‚Äôll be able to explore the Pro option for longer videos.
video.proInfoBody: You are currently at the planning stage of Pro features. As you get closer to launch, you‚Äôll detail Pro and long-video support. üöÄ
video.pickErrorBody: An error occurred while selecting video. Please try again.

share.freePostTip: You can also share without a task. Freely share your videos, moments and anything you like; they‚Äôll appear as independent cards in the feed.
share.platformNotConnectedBody: To share on {{platform}}, you must connect your {{platform}} account to Viral.
share.goProfileBody: Go to the ‚ÄúProfile‚Äù tab and connect your {{platform}} account from the ‚ÄúAccount connections‚Äù section.

alerts.missingContentBody: Select a task or add a title / description / video before creating the card.
alerts.successTaskBody: Task card has been shared in the feed.
alerts.successFreeBody: Your free share card has been added to the feed.

modes.givenDescription: Request a surprise task; Viral chooses one for you.
modes.selfDescription: You can add tasks for yourself on this page.

self.scheduleQuestion: When will you do this task?

focus-25min.title: Focus for 25 minutes
focus-25min.description: Silence your phone and focus on a single task for 25 minutes.

focus-deep-clean.title: Mini desk / workspace clean-up
focus-deep-clean.description: Collect unnecessary items on your desk; create a 10-minute ‚Äúfresh start‚Äù effect.

focus-inbox-zero.title: Lighten your inbox
focus-inbox-zero.description: Delete or archive at least 5 unnecessary emails today.

focus-no-scroll-20min.title: 20-minute ‚Äúno scroll‚Äù rule
focus-no-scroll-20min.description: Spend 20 minutes without scrolling any social media feed.

health-steps-6000.title: Take 6000 steps today
health-steps-6000.description: Plan short walks outside; reach at least 6000 steps in total.

health-water-6.title: Drink at least 6 glasses of water
health-water-6.description: Spread your water intake throughout the day and track it.

health-stretch-10.title: 10-minute stretch break
health-stretch-10.description: Do simple stretch exercises for your neck, shoulders and lower back.

health-walk-sunset.title: Evening mini walk
health-walk-sunset.description: Take a 15-minute fresh-air walk around sunset.

work-priority-task.title: Finish your most important task
work-priority-task.description: Choose today‚Äôs most important task, break it into smaller steps and complete it.

work-no-meeting-30.title: 30-minute meeting-free block
work-no-meeting-30.description: Create a 30-minute silent focus block in your calendar and avoid scheduling meetings in it.

work-feedback-ask.title: Ask for feedback
work-feedback-ask.description: Ask a teammate for brief feedback on a piece of work you did.

work-small-win-share.title: Note today‚Äôs small win
work-small-win-share.description: Write down in one sentence the work / progress that made you happiest today.

school-25min-study.title: 25 minutes of study / review
school-25min-study.description: Focus on only one subject; study 25 minutes without touching your phone.

school-question-solve.title: Solve at least 10 questions
school-question-solve.description: Solve at least 10 new questions today from a subject you choose.

school-notes-clean.title: Organize your notes
school-notes-clean.description: Clean up one topic in your notebook / digital notes and add headings.

school-share-tip.title: Send a study tip to a friend
school-share-tip.description: Share a study technique you use (Pomodoro, colorful notes, etc.) with a friend.

family-call-parent.title: Short chat with family
family-call-parent.description: Have at least a 5-minute sincere conversation with a parent or family member.

family-eat-together.title: Eat together
family-eat-together.description: Have a meal with your family at the same table without phones.

family-thank-message.title: Send a thank-you message
family-thank-message.description: Write a short ‚ÄúI‚Äôm glad you‚Äôre here‚Äù message to someone from your family.

social-message-friend.title: Send a message to a friend
social-message-friend.description: Ask ‚ÄúHow are you?‚Äù to someone you haven‚Äôt spoken to for a long time.

social-comment-support.title: Leave a supportive comment
social-comment-support.description: Write a sincere, supportive comment on a friend‚Äôs post.

social-share-win.title: Share today‚Äôs ‚Äúsmall win‚Äù
social-share-win.description: Get ready to save a moment that made you happy today as a card.

social-new-connection.title: Create a new connection
social-new-connection.description: Send a short hello message to someone you‚Äôve followed for a long time but never written to.

social-phone-free-coffee.title: Phone-free coffee / tea break
social-phone-free-coffee.description: Spend a 15-minute coffee break with a friend or alone without your phone.

viral-plan-card.title: Plan a Viral card
viral-plan-card.description: Think of a card idea for a moment, note or goal you want to share today and write its title.

viral-gratitude-3.title: Be grateful for 3 things
viral-gratitude-3.description: Write down 3 things you are grateful for today as short notes; you can turn them into a card if you like.

viral-before-after.title: Find a before / after photo idea
viral-before-after.description: Find something you can show ‚Äúbefore‚Äìafter‚Äù, such as desk organization, screen clean-up or a walking route.

request.areaTitle: Get today‚Äôs task as a surprise.
request.areaSubtitle: Press the button and Viral chooses a ready task for you.
request.changeUsedLabel: You‚Äôve used your change for today

pro.title: Assign a task to a friend (Pro)
pro.body: Coming soon: you‚Äôll be able to assign tasks to people from your friends list and send them notifications. This feature will be for Viral Pro users.
pro.alertBody: You are in the planning phase for Pro features. As the app gets closer to launch, you‚Äôll clarify the details. üöÄ

sharePanel.title: Share
sharePanel.infoText: You can share on external platforms using your connected accounts. Platforms may open their own share screens.

sharePanel.noAccounts:
You haven't connected any accounts yet.
Please connect accounts before sharing.
sharePanel.connectFallbackBody: You can add external accounts from the "Connect Accounts" section in your profile.

sharePanel.shareAllBody: We assume you shared on your connected accounts. Sharing is simulated in this version.

requireAccounts.title: Connect your accounts
requireAccounts.desc: To share on external platforms, you must connect your accounts first.
requireAccounts.desc2: You can add your external accounts from the "Connect my accounts" section on your profile screen.
